phrases: It connects the inside and outside.
That is because we have been here ever since we were born.
Mom always tells us, does not she?
Do not go near the gate or fence in the back of the forest because it is dangerous.
What do you want to do if you go outside?
I want to ride a giraffe!
I wonder what this gate is protecting us from.
Or you will be late for breakfast!
- Hey, wait for me! - No way!
Stop messing around and get ready!
- Emma, I cannot get my shoes on.
Good morning Don, Conny, and Little Bunny!
I am going to eat you!
Even though you have not eaten breakfast yet.
I am 11, the same as you guys!
And one of the oldest here!
Emma, can you give me a hand over here?
I am going to redo my entrance from the beginning.
I love that part about you.
That I am five years old on the inside?
The part where you care deeply about your family.
Let us give thanks that all 38 of you siblings are able to live here happily, today, too...
You are acting like a little baby, Conny.
Answer each question within nine seconds.
Well, I think I got at least half!
I did not get most of it.
Are you all ready for the results?
You three did an amazing job.
You got all of them right!
Norman is a genius who has the best brains.
And Ray, an intellect who can compete against Norman's genius.
Emma has amazing athletic skills, and her learning ability allows her to stay close to the other two.
They say the House has never had three kids at this level together before.
No wonder Mom is happy with them.
I challenge you to a game of tag!
We will outrun you this time for sure!
Thank you for always helping me, Don.
You do not have to thank me!
Anytime, anywhere you are in need!
Based on the size of these shoe's footsteps...
You let your guard down, Norman!
Don, you always let your guard down.
Do not I always tell you?
Your weakness is that you make quick judgment and lose your cool.
Well, it is Norman after all.
Emma, your weakness is that you are nice.
What does Norman have that you do not?
If it is about simple physical ability, you have the upper hand.
But Norman is strong right here.
It is a game where you compete with strategy.
It is like chess, but using your entire body.
But you are a better tactician than me, Ray.
But we are not even close when it comes to Mom.
We have never beaten her at chess.
Next game, everyone will be It except you!
He is losing his cool again.
You cannot go near there, no matter what.
Yeah, Mom is always telling us that.
The gate and the fence deep in the forest are dangerous.
What part of this is dangerous?
The fence is low, and I do not see anything threatening.
But if Mom is telling us that...
You really love Mom, after all.
Are you sure you guys are playing tag?
Oh, is the game over already?
We should call it a day.
If we are late, Mom will be worried.
We will eventually leave this place, huh?
Of course we will leave eventually.
We do not receive letters from anyone.
You know, after they leave the House, no one writes us.
I am sure they are being considerate to their foster parents.
But we have all been together ever since we were born!
Even if we are not related by blood, we are truer siblings than most.
They must be having so much fun everyday that they have forgotten about the House.
I want to go outside, too!
- Not again. - I mean, come on!
We only have this one uniform!
I read in books that the outside world has so many different types of clothes!
I want to wear them all!
I want to eat delicious food.
I want to go on a date with a cute girl.
Oh, that is not what I meant.
I want to see a train!
I want to go to different places and see things I have never seen before.
Once I get outside, well, I would have to survive first.
You want to ride a giraffe, right?
Well, I do not really want to leave.
I want to stay here forever!
Hey, that is kind of unfair.
But I am so happy right now.
I will write a lot of letters.
I will never forget about everyone.
When I leave the House, I want to become a mother like Mom.
And then, I will never abandon any children.
You love Mom very much, do not you?
I am slow, and I was not as smart as everyone, but even after I leave, I will do my best.
I will have Little Bunny so I will be okay.
I do not want to leave anymore.
Let us hurry and finish up cleaning.
From the window, I saw the lights on the gate were still on.
Mom is not back yet either, so I do not think Conny has left yet.
You cannot go near there, no matter what.
Let us get scolded together, later.
Is this the truck that will take Conny?
Actually, I have never seen a vehicle before.
Maybe she will find it if we leave it in the back.
Hey, did you hear a voice just now?
If it was a stray cat, I would have caught it and ate it.
Cannot I at least have a fingertip?
It is not something the likes of us can have.
All of the human flesh produced on this farm are high-quality meat intended for the rich.
Lately we have been shipping out normal quality ones.
But it looks like we will soon harvest some high quality ones.
Make the preparations to pluck these three with full scores.
It was the usual, kind Mom, right?
That girl was not Conny, right?
Were we raised just to be eaten by something?
We have to leave this place.
If it is the three of us...
Otherwise they will definitely get killed.
I do not want any more of my family to die.
How will us kids run away from those monsters?
It will be the same as playing tag.
We will find a way for all of us to survive.
